div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 8 Melos, 1825? (671) Burial: c. 500-490 B.C. (T) Contents: AR Coins of same type as Santorin 1821 (no. 7 above) but "evidently of more modern date," including Cyzicus st. (as Traité pl. 16,25) and Miletus? st. with ΟΥΛ (as Traité pl. 19,13) Disposition: London some Borrell, NC 1843-4, p. 134 Wroth, NC 1884, pp. 272-4
